column4: Hello all again.. trying to install the nvidia video driver but am getting an error of - dpkg: error processing /var/cache/apt/archives/nvidia-glf_1.0.6111-lubuntu8_i386.deb (--unpack)
there should be more to that error....
the message that you pasted still isn't the complete message.. if you scroll up, you should be able to see the reason that the package couldn't be installed
